exceptions.tactic: destruct (execute_log' log' (handler (eInput e) st) (tr ++ [(eInput e, fst (handler (eInput e) st))])) as [tr' st'] eqn:H.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params e : entry log' : list entry st : data tr : list (input * output) IHlog : fst (execute_log' log' st tr) = tr ++ fst (execute_log' log' st []) The term "handler (eInput e) st" has type "(output * data)%type" while it is expected to have type "data".

ctx: induction log as [| e log' IHlog].
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params p0 : list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data p : input -> data -> output * data one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params e : entry log' : list entry st : data tr : list (input * output) IHlog : fst (execute_log' log' st tr) = tr ++ fst (execute_log' log' st []) i : entry -> input o : output d : data Heqp1 : p (i e) st = (o, d) X2 : list (input * output) X7 : data X3 : input X5 : output X6 : data X : ?A -> ?B -> ?A Unable to unify "tr ++ fst (p0 log' d [(i e, o)])" with "fst (p0 log' d (tr ++ [(i e, o)]))".

original: intros log st tr. induction log as [| e log' IHlog]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (execute_log' log' (handler (eInput e) st) (tr ++ [(eInput e, fst (handler (eInput e) st))])) as [tr' st'] eqn:H. rewrite IHlog. rewrite H. reflexivity.
